entry.string: ATTENTION! YOU ARE ABOUT TO LOGOUT FROM ADMIN SYSTEM..
entry.translation: ACHTUNG! SIE SIND DABEI SICH ALS ADMINISTRATOR ABZUMELDEN.

entry.string: Are you sure? Click "Cancel" to return to the previous page..
entry.translation: Sind Sie sicher? Klicken sie "Abbrechen" um zur vorigen Seite zur√ºckzukommen.

entry.string: Admin Menu sort modules by Category or Name - global switch, can be overriden in individual instances of the Adminpanels Admin Menu block

Enable Admin Dashboard - This switch turns on the Admin Dashboard, a special theme reserved only for Site Administrators. By Default it diplays as a horizontal drop down menu with all active modules with an Admin UI listed.
